instructions: You will be asked about your willingness to pay (WTP) for public goods. First, answer a referendum question (Yes/No) about a specific dollar amount. Then, state the maximum amount you would be willing to pay.

items.question: Would you be willing to pay $[ANCHOR] for saving 50,000 seabirds each year from the effects of offshore oil spills?
What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay for saving 50,000 seabirds each year from the effects of offshore oil spills?
Would you be willing to pay $[ANCHOR] for achieving a 20% reduction in automobile accidents in the state over 5 years?
What is the maximum amount you would be willing to pay for achieving a 20% reduction in automobile accidents in the state over 5 years?
